user_instruction: 'Send an email to Alex (alex@globaltech.com) to follow up on our conversation about tech trends. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Information Needed to Draft Follow-Up Email to Alex (GlobalTech)

Hi there,

I’d like to send a thoughtful follow-up message to Alex (alex@globaltech.com) about the tech-trend discussion we started at the Global Tech Innovators Conference. Could you please help me gather the background material first?

1. Gmail  
   • Locate and forward (or label) the entire email thread with Alex, including any attachments.  
2. NotionManager  
   • Share any notes, action items, or resources tagged “Global Tech Innovators Conference” or “Tech Trends” that mention Alex.  
   • Drop them into my “Outreach – Alex G.” workspace or provide a quick summary.

Having this information on hand will let me reference our previous points accurately.

Many thanks for the assist!

Best,  
Jane

final_output:
